sentences.english: The spindles arise in the brain's sensory relay centre in the thalamus.

sentences.english: Mobile phone relays stations were severely damaged, making it difficult to make cell phone calls.

sentences.english: Mainly and breathes the myo- relay station for the relation top digit brain.
